articles.title: New deals in the COVID economy - Axios
articles.description: The pandemic has destroyed countless businesses, but it also appears to have created a bespoke economy altogether.
articles.content:
COVID-19 is the macro horror of our lifetimes, and has destroyed or severely damaged countless businesses. But, like with most horribles, it also has created some opportunities.

articles.title: 1 in 3 parents say family holiday gatherings worth the risk of Covid-19 - CNN
articles.description: A third of parents in a new poll published Monday said gathering the family for Thanksgiving is worth the risk of catching or spreading Covid-19.
